#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main(){
	
	int digits = 0;
	while(cin >> digits){
		int ctrl = 0, tmp = digits,flag = 0;
		while(digits >= 1){
			ctrl = digits % 10;
			
			if(ctrl != 0 && tmp %ctrl != 0){
				flag = 1;
				break;
			}
			
			digits /= 10;
		}
		
		cout << (flag == 0 ? "Valid\n" : "Invalid\n");
	}//end while	
	
	return 0;
}//end main
